columns.name: condition
columns.description: Conditions (e.g. client IP ranges) associated with the API token.

columns.name: issued_on
columns.description: When the API token was issued.

columns.name: modified_on
columns.description: When the API token was last modified.

columns.name: not_before
columns.description: When the API token becomes valid.

columns.name: policies
columns.description: Policies associated with this API token.
